Web Design | Web Development

I have built different layouts for different businesses, always trying to keep it simple while maintaining a high visual appeal, the idea is always to achieve and mix a pleasant User Interface and User Experience. Technique wise, I have worked building Websites and Web Applications with pure HTML, CSS, JS and PHP, and also with CMS'(Content Management System) and Frameworks such as Wordpress and Angular. I always try to keep a "get things done" mindset, taking advantage of the technologies available to have a nice project up and running quickly enough, while keeping it clean and easy to maintain. For example, mixing a nice custom layout with Wordpress (whether it's custom built or from a pre-existing theme), making a good looking website fully functional with an e-commerce platform, such as WooCommerce.

As a Full Stack Developer for Digital Salon, I was able to specialize and create Websites for a niche target (Hair, Beauty and SPA salons), having to integrate e-commerce and online booking systems to them while making sure they had a high visual appeal. I had used many different techniques in this job, mainly integrating Wordpress with WooCommerce and having worked with Premium and Custom themes. I am also responsible for the back end configuration and maintenance of the server (Digital Ocean) where we host around 200 websites.

Mobile App Development

The Mobile App area has always interested me due to the moment we're living in. The initial obvious choice was picking up technologies that derived from the Web Development world. For that, I had studied more of JavaScript and experimented with the Angular and Ionic frameworks. Although these were the technologies I picked, I never limit myself to specific ones, so having had this experience in the trending world of Progressive Web Apps, I am also studying how native app development works and its perks. You can see below some of the mobile apps I had developed with the Ionic Framework alongside Firebase or Laravel as a back end. Many native features and API integrations such as Google Maps, Camera, GeoLocation, Push Notifications, Instant Messaging (Chat) have also been utilized in these projects.

Game Development

I really believe that Game Development is a great school for programming as it makes many coding concepts clearer such as Object Oriented and simply a better understanding of algorithms. As a life long game enthusiast, I have always been interested in Game Programming. Although just being a "fancy" hobby of mine at the moment, you can also check some of my Gaming Development work below. Work done using C# with the Unity framework.

How Do I Work?

I have worked building Websites and Web Applications with pure HTML, CSS, JS and PHP, and also with CMS'(Content Management System) and Frameworks such as Wordpress, WooCommerce, Angular, Ionic, Laravel. I have also touched many other technologies and platforms such as Joomla and Magento, SquareSpace and Wix, and the list goes on. I am first and foremost a Developer that understands that different techologies and techniques may fit different projects and solutions, so I am always open to new ideas and work environments.

Having said that, I always try to keep a "get things done" mindset, taking advantage of the technologies available to have a nice project up and running quickly enough, while keeping it clean and easy to maintain. For example, mixing a nice custom layout with Wordpress (whether it's custom built or from a pre-existing theme), making a good looking website fully functional with an e-commerce platform, such as WooCommerce. I love jumping into a brand new project with new technologies, but also understand that there's no need to re-invent the wheel all of the time to get a great and solid project released.

I did, however, mentioned the technologies I am more familiar in the paragraph above, so you can count that it would probably take me less time for me to find a solution using one of those :)
